description: This file defines a custom exception class 'EntityNotFoundException' extending a base exception 'SimpleBankingGlobalException'. It is part of the 'com.javatodev.finance.exception' package, used to indicate that a requested entity was not found in the database.
external_methods: Super class constructor super(String message, int errorCode)

classes.name: EntityNotFoundException
classes.description: Custom exception indicating that the requested entity does not exist in the database.

methods.name: EntityNotFoundException()
methods.description: Default constructor initializing the exception with a standard message and error code.

methods.name: EntityNotFoundException(String message)
methods.description: Constructor initializing the exception with a custom message and a standard error code.
